entry.title: compute12 Maintenance
entry.content:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly perform maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Thursday, 17.02.2022 at 10:00 (CET).

During this time, cloud servers on compute12 will be temporarily unavailable. Cloud Servers that are already off will be migrated first. Afterwards we will shutdown any cloud server's that are still running via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding

Affected Instances e6869042-7328-46d2-a13c-add1b5376f00

f0354379-336e-4184-ada6-64905a183d72

2022-02-17T09:00:00.000Z
Update

We are beginning with the migrations now.

2022-02-17T10:20:00.000Z
Resolved

Migrations have been completed.

entry.title: compute01 Maintenance
entry.content:
In order to further improve our product quality and guarantee the stability of our services, we regularly carry out maintenance work on our systems.

The maintenance work will take place on Friday, 28.01.2022 at 09:00 (CET) and will last up to one hour.

During this time, cloud servers on compute01 will be unavailable. During the maintenance window, we will shut down the cloud servers via APCI (Software Shutdown).

Thank you for your understanding

2022-01-28T08:55:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed. All cloud servers are online again.

entry.title: Billing Panel Maintenance
entry.content:
We are performing scheduled maintenance on 11th of November 2021 from 10:00 to 12:00 (CEST). During this time the billing panel will be unavailable.

2021-11-11T11:10:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

entry.title: network connectivity issues
entry.summary: Due to a technical problem, the network connectivity of individual IP addresses is currently limited. We are already working on a solution
entry.content:
Due to a technical problem, the network connectivity of individual IP addresses is currently limited. We are already working on a solution

2021-11-03T08:48:24.000Z
Resolved

The reason for the network issue was a bug in one of our packet forwarding engines. The malfunction has been repaired and the network is stable again.

entry.title: Billing System Maintenance
entry.content:
On 27.07.2021 we will perform maintenance work on our billing system from 12pm to 2pm (CEST). During this time, the Customer Center will be completely or partially unavailable.

2021-07-27T12:00:00.000Z
Update

The maintenance work is delayed by about 60min. Sorry for the inconvenience

2021-07-27T13:00:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

entry.title: Maintenance on tshost.myvirtualserver.com
entry.content:
The maintenance work will take place on Tuesday the 27.07.2021 at 10 A.M. (CEST) and will probably last 20 minutes, during this time the whole teamspeak host will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

2021-07-27T08:20:39.662Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

entry.title: Maintenance on web01.vnetso.com
entry.content:
The maintenance work will take place on Saturday the 24.07.2021 at 11 P.M. (CEST) and will probably last 120 minutes, during this time the whole webspace including (depending on your configuration) website and mail will be unavailable. This maintenance work is necessary to further improve the quality of our products.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

2021-07-24T23:35:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.

entry.title: Billing system and Teamspeak Host malfunction
entry.summary: Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.
entry.content:
Currently our billing system and the Teamspeak host are not available due to a technical error. Our specialists are already working on a solution.

2021-06-10T10:39:23.000Z
Resolved

Due to a software error on a node, the billing system, web01 and the Teamspeak host were not accessible. The problem has been fixed since 10:40 UTC. We apologize for the inconvenience.

entry.title: Some VPS offline
entry.summary: We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.
entry.content:
We are receiving reports of some VPS being offline and are currently investigating the issue.

2021-05-24T17:50:02.000Z
Resolved

Due to a distributed attack some VPS experienced degraded network stability. The network is stable again since 17:10 UTC. We apologise for the inconvenience.

entry.title: Billing System Maintenance
entry.content:
We are performing maintenance on our billing system.

2021-05-03T08:48:00.000Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete..

entry.title: Billing System Maintenance
entry.content:
We are performing maintenance on our billing system.

2021-04-26T11:57:44.649Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete..

entry.title: Upgrade of core router equipment
entry.summary: Core Switches and Router are replaced with better hardware to increase throughput.
entry.content:
We are replacing core switches and router hardware to increase throughput and scale the network.

Expect short network outages or degraded stability of up to 5 minutes during the maintenance window.

2021-03-30T07:33:30.119Z
Update

We are beginning with the maintenance shortly. Expect interruptions of up to 5 minutes during the maintenance window.

2021-03-30T08:50:48.568Z
Resolved

Maintenance is now complete. There was a single interruption of 30 seconds for IPv4 traffic and 5 minutes for IPv6 traffic.

entry.title: Dedicated Server Relocation
entry.summary: We are relocating dedicated server hardware of a few customers
entry.content:
We are relocating dedicated server hardware of a few customers. Affected customers have been notified via email.

2021-03-29T17:14:14.215Z
Resolved

We have completed the maintenance. Affected customers were offline for less than 5 minutes.
